sentences.en: A red tarpaulin could indicate the presence of seriously injured victims who needed immediate evacuation.
sentences.cn: 而红色则表明有重伤员需要立即疏散.

sentences.en: A yellow tarpaulin could indicate that casualties needed evacuation but that the situation was not critical.
sentences.cn: 黄色说明该中心有需要疏散的伤员但这种情况并不非常紧急.

sentences.en: After that, in order to buy them on the ground tarpaulin, from Zouping to Zibo car.
sentences.cn: 随后, 他们以去买篷布为由, 从淄博租车去邹平.

sentences.en: Any odorous stockpiled material left in excess of two days shall be covered with tarpaulin sheets.
sentences.cn: 任何带有难闻气味的堆存物料,堆存多于2天,必须以防水帆布盖好.

sentences.en: Many refugees are sheltering under makeshift tarpaulin structures.
sentences.cn: 许多灾民住在临时用防水布搭建的帐篷里.

sentences.en: Packing materials, Tarpaulin and Packing materials belong to our portfolio . For more information please call us.
sentences.cn: 公司在包装材料 、 打包材料以及(车辆上和盖货物的)帆布棚领域内取得成就.

sentences.en: Shell fabric for automobile and toy: tarpaulin, loop velvet, poly spun velour, and etc.
sentences.cn: 汽车、玩具面料系列: 顶蓬布 、 圈绒 、 不倒绒等.

sentences.en: The pool furniture was folded, stacked, and covered with a tarpaulin.
sentences.cn: 游泳池的设备都已经折叠起来, 堆在那里, 还盖上了防水布.

sentences.en: We put a tarpaulin across the window to block out the sun - light.
sentences.cn: 我们将油布横挂在窗子上遮住阳光.

sentences.en: With over 15 years specialized experience in manufacturing, selling, and serving of tarpaulin.
sentences.cn: 具有15年以上专业经验,在制造, 销售, 服务的油布.

words.tran_cn: 柏油帆布；防水帽；防水衣；涂焦油防水布

trans.tran_en: a large heavy cloth or piece of thick plastic that water will not pass through, used to keep rain off things
